//testbench for imm testing opcode 6 for ADDI 
00000000 00000000
00000001 1C470001 // LW $7,0($8)
00000002 00000000 //stall
00000003 00000000 //stall
00000004 00432000 // ADD $4,$2,$3
00000005 00000000 //stall
00000006 00000000
00000007 20240002  // SW $4,2($1)
00000008 24870004  // BEQ $4,$7,3
